txt.en: Valdi can be found in Amdân.\n\nYou should talk to Valdi.
'You have done a great service for the Haban’akkâ.'

'We shall deprive the enemy of their foul steeds! Wargs have spent years burrowing into the mountainside and spreading through the forests. They vie for the so-called honour of being chosen as mounts for the Orc-chieftains. Our scouts have identified four of their champions whose defeat would be a great benefit to the Haban’akkâ.'
Among the hills of Azanulbizar, deadly Wargs vie for the privilege of being steed to the Orc-chieftains.
Warg champions can be found in eastern Azanulbizar.\n\nValdi has asked you to defeat Warg champions.
